Encoded from http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4358232/The_Cure_-_Picture_Show_%5BMP4%5D
With all due respect to the original uploader, H.264 is not compatible with standalone players, and 3GB at standard-def is too big for an iPod. That, and the picture was distorted on the MP4. Thank you for the source material, though. It was nice to work with, and to maintain quality :)
